About Me

I'm Mohamed Essam and Web Developer

Hi! My name is Mohamed Essam form Cairo, Egypt. I study business information at Misr University. I like programming and coding on computer.
I started to learn online courses for a year. I Design, Develop, and Implement websites.
What I have learned is HTML 5, CSS, JavaScript programming language, JQuery, and Bootstrap. I have made more than 20 projects in my portfolio. I enjoy every step of the design process, from discussion and collaboration. I can deliver a compatible websites for different devices and browsers. So, I am sure that you are gonna like my works.
